title: I'm still building this page up, but it'll have more details soon!
body: But since you're curious, one of the main projects I'm working on is a toolbox of useful resources for the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV. Tools include one to help users find mob drop locations, another to convert 5 minutes real-time to in-game hours to organize community mob kills, and another to quickly show spell loadouts and completion guides for weekly Masked Carnivals.

projects.title: Project One
projects.dateRange: Start Date - End Date for Project One
